errors.error_description: The URL provided for adding the FHEM update source points to a non-existent `main` branch instead of the correct `master` branch, which will cause the 'update add' command to fail.
A critical warning, advising users not to run the peer setup command on their main FHEM instance, has been removed. This could lead to users accidentally misconfiguring their primary FHEM system.
correction_candidates: Add the note: `This command should be run as the 'pi' user.`
Add the warning: `### WARNING: DO THIS COMMAND ONLY ON REMOTE PEER, NOT ON YOUR FHEM INSTANCE ###`
Add the note: `This script will install a systemd service.`
Add the warning: `### WARNING: THIS COMMAND REQUIRES SUDO PRIVILEGES ###`
errors.golden_answer: Add the warning: `### WARNING: DO THIS COMMAND ONLY ON REMOTE PEER, NOT ON YOUR FHEM INSTANCE ###`
